ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Which is precisely why I didn t Kabong! it.  It seems to be of immense interest to the list, and no one seemed overly inflammatory (well, there was one,
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:41 PM 9/30/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>i understand your position, i just don't know how many people it applies to.
>i actually am enjoying this discussion, i like debating intelligently,
>without getting TOO offensive =) and damn it really got this list going, i
>haven't even been able to read the other posts like the bard letter to GZ
>Part Three.

Which is precisely why I didn't "Kabong!" it. It seems to be of immense
interest to the list, and no one seemed overly inflammatory (well, there
was one, but it was easily handled).

You guys really make some of the best arguments I've seen. =) Bards rule -
whether or not you actually play one ;)

Talies
